function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of conclusive evidence for the effectiveness of SHL oral liquid against COVID-19","Impact":"Potential reliance on an unproven treatment for COVID-19","Mitigation":"Emphasize the need for evidence-based treatments and cautious use of traditional remedies","Technologies":"Evidence-based clinical trials and research studies","People":"Patients, medical practitioners, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Medical research institutions, regulatory authorities, and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Delay in the development of a commercially viable vaccine for COVID-19","Impact":"Prolonged spread of the disease and increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Invest in expedited vaccine development, global collaboration, and resource allocation","Technologies":"Vaccine development technologies, research funding, and regulatory frameworks","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of preventive measures recommended by WHO and CDC","Impact":"Continued spread and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Education, public health campaigns, and strict adherence to guidelines","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, contact tracing technologies, and public health infrastructure","People":"General population, government authorities, and public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and community leaders"}]}
